network_create_socket: This function is used to create a new client socket for your game to communicate over the network. You must define the socket type (see the list of constants below) and the function will return a unique id for that socket, which should be used in all further function calls for that socket, or a value of less than 0 if the connection fails.
NOTE: You can use the IP "127.0.0.1" to connect back to the same device that is running the game.
